places.name: Bahia Mar Boutique Hotel
places.description: 1st best value for money out of 868 places to stay in: Mozambique The staff is very friendly and professional. Suite with pool is very spacious, comfortable beds and very clean rooms. There is also a gym with personal trainer.

places.name: Southern Sun
places.description: 2nd best value for money out of 868 places to stay in: Mozambique Perfectly decorated rooms, with stunning views of the pool, garden and beach. very comfortable beds with all the necessary amenities for a great stay.

places.name: Radisson Blu Hotel & Residence, Maputo
places.description: 3rd best value for money out of 868 places to stay in: Mozambique Rooms - spacious and comfortable (ask for east facing ocean). Great gym and pool too! The location is a 15-minute drive from the airport (approximate estimate 7 km)

places.name: White Pearl Resorts Ponta Mamoli
places.description: 4th best value for money out of 868 places to stay in: Mozambique Suite with outdoor shower and fantastic plunge pool. The on-site SCUBA diving facilities are an added bonus as the waters in front of the resort are teeming with marine life.

places.name: Gala Gala Eco Resort
places.description: 5th best value for money out of 868 places to stay in: Mozambique The location is on the beach away from the hustle and bustle in a treetop full of lots of birds and butterflies. Delicious and quick coffee, breakfast and lunch. Lovely common area with comfortable sofas

places.name: StayEasy Maputo
places.description: 6th best value for money out of 868 places to stay in: Mozambique Convenient location opposite the beach and close to the airport. Next to Baia Mall which is also convenient. The rooms are very clean, modern and equipped with everything needed for a stay.

places.name: Naara Eco Lodge & Spa
places.description: 7th best value for money out of 868 places to stay in: Mozambique We have a boat trip to get to know the region better. Waiters are hospitable and always friendly. Overall, great food, great customer service.

places.name: Kumba Lodge
places.description: 8th best value for money out of 868 places to stay in: Mozambique, The property is excellently located, the rooms are clean, good breakfast, restaurant with excellent cuisine. Excellent staff, super friendly and helpful, the managers will treat you to suitable guests

places.name: Villas do Indico Ocean Eco-Resort & Spa
places.description: 9th best value for money out of 868 places to stay in: Mozambique The luxury accommodation was well decorated and clean. The fact that there are only 5 cottages means it can never be overcrowded. A fantastic team that takes great care of its customers.
